entry.title: Maroon & Off-White Hand Block Printed Braided Ethnic Sling Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 750.00

Maroon & Off-White Hand Block Printed Cotton Sling Bag

Ethically Made. Effortlessly Stylish. Earth-Friendly.

Step into sustainable fashion with our handcrafted sling bag — a fusion of heritage textile art and conscious living. This maroon and off-white cotton sling bag features traditional hand block printed motifs, skillfully created by Indian artisans using eco-friendly dyes.

Its soft braided strap adds a playful charm, while the spacious interior makes it perfect for everyday use — from local markets to mindful travels. Made entirely from natural cotton and stitched with care, this bag is a zero-plastic, low-impact fashion companion.

Whether paired with earthy tones or bold solids, it adds a splash of culture and conscious design to your look.

Product Features:

  • 100% Natural Cotton Fabric
  • Traditional Hand Block Printed Design
  • Earthy Maroon & Off-White Color Scheme
  • Braided Fabric Strap for Comfort & Style
  • Wooden Button Closure
  • Ethically Made in India
  • Washable & Reusable
  • Lightweight, Spacious, and Plastic-Free

Sustainability Notes:

This bag is handcrafted in small batches using eco-conscious materials and natural dyes. By choosing this product, you're supporting artisan livelihoods and making a planet-positive fashion choice.

entry.title: Blue & Off-white Hand Block Printed Braided Ethnic Sling Bags.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 750.00

Blue & Off-White Hand Block Printed Cotton Sling Bag

Artisan-Made. Earth-Loving. Uniquely You.

Product Description

Elevate your everyday style with this beautifully handcrafted Blue & Off-White Sling Bag by Almitra Sustainables. Made using traditional hand block printing techniques and stitched from soft, breathable organic cotton, this bag combines artistic heritage with modern functionality.

The contrast braided cotton strap, vibrant mustard yellow top panel, and indigo-inspired block motifs create a soulful, ethnic aesthetic perfect for eco-conscious fashion lovers. Whether you're heading to a farmers' market, a casual brunch, or a nature walk, this bag blends utility with earthy elegance.

Why You'll Love It

  • Handcrafted using natural cotton
  • Ethically hand block printed by Indian artisans
  • Plastic-free, biodegradable, and sustainably sourced materials
  • Spacious enough to hold your daily essentials
  • Durable braided shoulder strap for comfortable wear
  • Lightweight and foldable – perfect for conscious travel
  • Ideal for conscious consumers seeking zero-waste, sustainable fashion

Sustainability First

At Almitra Sustainables, we honor traditional craftsmanship and sustainable living. Every sling bag is part of our mission to reduce plastic and synthetic usage – handcrafted with care, and rooted in purpose.

entry.title: Yellow & Off-White Hand Block Printed Braided Ethnic Sling Bags
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 750.00

Yellow & Off-White Hand Block Printed Ethnic Cotton Sling Bag – Braided Strap

Product Description

Celebrate Sustainable Style with Handmade Artistry

Crafted with love and rooted in tradition, our Yellow & Off-White Hand Block Printed Sling Bag is a vibrant tribute to India’s timeless craft. Handcrafted using natural dyes and ethically sourced cotton, this eco-friendly bag features a striking dual-tone design with detailed hand block prints. The braided shoulder strap, made from upcycled fabric scraps, adds a rustic, artisanal touch while supporting zero-waste goals.

Perfect for your daily essentials, weekend outings, or conscious gifting, this bag blends style, functionality, and sustainability in every thread.

Product Features:

  • 100% organic cotton with natural, non-toxic dyes
  • Traditional hand block printed design
  • Upcycled, braided shoulder strap for comfort and charm
  • Lightweight, durable & roomy
  • Ethically handcrafted by rural artisans in India
  • Sustainable, zero-waste, and biodegradable

Every Almitra Sustainables product is a step toward a cleaner planet and a celebration of conscious living. By choosing our handmade bags, you empower artisan communities, reduce plastic waste, and walk with purpose.

entry.title: .Pushpah - Handmade Ethnic Yoga Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 1200.00

Pushpah – Handcrafted Yoga Bag

Our Yoga Bags are inspired from the elements of Earth which supports and enhances every life on this planet. These Bags are Earthy, Handwoven from traditional natural fabric and are frayed by hands, preserving the sanctity & beauty of these bags. Manifesting style and boldness, these bags will let you tap into that higher energy!

Features

  • Handmade
  • Frayed By Hands
  • Ethic
  • Has a Side Pocket

entry.title: .Larona Tote Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 450.00

Larona is a beautiful Handwoven Tote which captures the jazzy Color spectrum of a Rainbow, that’s why it’s called a Rainbow Tote!

A convenient, stylish and sustainable companion for your daily shopping. The bag comes with a zipped pocket inside, which can be used for keys, as a coin pouch or to keep your handphone protected. It’s sturdy and soft, offering a great grip and comfortable carry.

These bags are made by small artist groups and made with minimal waste. The structure designing and sewing is done in a conscious way to avoid waste and provide maximum optimization. Carry your essentials in a chic and conscientious manner with our upcycled tote bags.

Size – 38.1cms h * 40.64 cms w

Material – 100% Cotton

Packaging – We ensure that all our packaging is eco-friendly
